title.en: I Changed My Life By Signing In

altTitles.zh: Wǒ Kào Qiān Dào Nì Tiān Gǎi Mìng

altTitles.en: By Registering, My Life Has Been Altered
My Life Changed In Another World

description.en: After the male protagonist crossed, he was mistakenly taken in by the Jade Female Sect, which was full of female disciples, and became a nursing home to watch the gate. Favoured by the god-level check-in system, he obtained a magical physique that had never been seen in ancient times: the Spring Heart Divine Body. It is necessary to constantly adjust the girls to obtain welfare stimuli and convert the excitement points into cultivation. The Jade Girl Sect is surrounded by strong enemies and is in danger. In order to protect his own En (NV) people, the male protagonist relies on the super god sign-in system, fights the same way, kills the demon Xiu, fights the alien race, and zhen eight.
description.es-la: Después de cruzar, el héroe es acogido por la Secta de la Doncella de Jade, que está llena de discípulas, y se convierte en guardián de la puerta. Es favorecido por el sistema de registro divino y adquiere un físico mágico sin precedentes en la historia: el Cuerpo Divino Transformador del Corazón de Primavera. Tiene que seguir enseñando a las chicas para obtener beneficios y excitación, y convertir su excitación en cultivo. Para proteger a su benefactor, el héroe, con la ayuda del sistema de registro divino, lucha contra sus compañeros, mata a los demonios, lucha contra los extranjeros y sacude a los ocho clanes.
description.zh: 男主穿越后阴差阳错的被全是女弟子的玉女宗收留，成为看大门的护院。而被神级签到系统眷顾的他，获得亘古未有之神奇体质：春心化神体。男主需要不断调教妹子获取福利刺激，进而将兴奋值转化为内力提升修为。这时日渐式微的玉女宗被强敌环伺，岌岌可危，多亏天才女帝艰苦支撑才不至于被吞食消灭，为了守护自己的恩（nv）人，我们的男主身为保安自然恪尽职守，凭借超神签到系统，打同道，杀魔修，战异族，震八荒，称神称帝，造福己方。
